questions.quote: I'd like to apologize. I want to tell him I.. I.. didn't mean to get him in trouble.
You have no idea what an idiot is. Elaine just gave me a chance to get out and I didn't take it.  This is an idiot.
What? The two of you workin' in that garage is like a steel cage death match.
Aw, Mr Mandelbaum, I just wanted to come by and tell you how sorry I was that you hurt yourself.
Really?  You know Gary, I really have to say, I'm a little bit hurt that you didn't decide to confide in me.
Powerful. He is so powerful, he can lift a hundred pounds right up over his head. And um, what else. What else. Oh, right. Um, well, he's kind of, just kind of losing his hair.
I'm tellin'you, I never told anyone about that baby. I never even went near your building!
Hey, Cosmo what happened to your mother last night. She hung me out to dry.
Alright, I gotta go home and open up with the house for the carpet cleaners. You know they're doing my whole place for twenty-five dollars.
Believe me, Jerry, somewhere in this hospital the anguished "oink" of pig-man cries out for help.
